Package compiler.blocks

package compiler.blocks
Defines a collection of Blocks, that are used to store the locations of instructions. These locations are later retrieved to fill incomplete branch instructions.
Author:
Alex Mandelias
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Block
    A collection of variables that contain the information necessary to produce machine code for a block of code that contains jump instructions.
    IfBlock
    Block for code in an if and an else statement.
    WhileBlock
    Block for code in a while statement.
